choices: Ash remembers who was with him.
Ash remembers how he wound up here.
Ash can't remember anything and starts to wander.
A rustling from a nearby bush interrupts him.
1.content:
"Pikachu, use thunderbolt!"

Watching a clip play out as a boy and his pokemon in question struck one of the countless drones of Team Rocket, Giovanni sighed as he saw the looks of shame written over the various faces of his grunts.

"Is this really what keeps impeding our operations? A boy with an unevolved Pikachu? This is unacceptable!" The mob boss called out angrily. Sensing the rage rolling off the regal man, most of the varying grunts stepped back a bit as to not be caught in their employer's wrath.

Looking back at the video again as he studied the boys face more, the older man shifted his gaze to one of the admins beside him. "Make him disappear. I don't care how. If I see this one interfering with Team Rocket's ambitions again, then he won't be the only ones I'll take care of personally." Giovanni hissed before turning back around as the multitude of monitors changed from the most recent clip of the organization's failure to various maps showing the different regions they were stationed in.

Leaving the room in a single file, the two admins who oversaw their boss's plans were the last to leave as they approached one of the scientists they worked alongside. "Dr. Zager! You're in charge of this. You heard the boss. Create whatever you want to take out this trainer. Do it with whatever means you need. The number of funds is of no matter to how much this boy's cost us. Do I make myself clear?" Ariana announced before walking away with her fellow admin, Archer.

Making his way back to his lab, the scientist set out to create his new device. He already had a plan in mind that was foolproof. If giant machines and weapons didn't work to stop this boy, then something a little smaller would do the trick. Something that would make him, a little smaller to be exact...

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _


Coming too slowly as his vision blurred, Ash stared up at the sky with a lingering headache as he watched the clouds passing by. Why was he on his back? Leaning up slowly, the raven-haired trainer groaned before rubbing his forehead.

"What the heck happened?" He saw some kind of light and then, he was on his back. This was weird... But, so was everything else now too...

Looking around slowly as he tried to register what was going on, the trainer's eyes widened as he saw the massive landscape he was now in. It was a forest, and the trees were all around him... But, they were gigantic!

Gawking at the sheer size of the different oaks and flora around him, Ash could only shake his head. "What is with this place Pikachu? Pikachu?" Looking around as no reply came, Ash soon began to panic. Where was his partner pokemon!?

Standing up quickly, the perturbed boy looked all around but there was no sign of his pokemon anywhere... or his Pokeballs. He was completely alone out here... Wherever here was...

Wracking his mind as he tried to remember what had caused him to end up here, Ash thought hard for an answer... It was slowly coming back to him... But, what was it?
1.title: Interfering one to many times...

choices: A Gym Leader he met before coming here
12.content: Thinking back, Ash soon remembered something. He had been with someone before he had woken up here. Who was it?
12.title: Ash remembers who was with him.

121.content: Who was the companion, and in what region?
121.title: A female traveling companion

1211.content: Which one of them was the companion? Or was it multiple?
1211.title: Misty, May, Dawn

1212.content: Which one of them was the companion? Or was it multiple?
1212.title: Iris, Serena, Bonnie

choices: Run up to her and scream her name.
Try and get to her body so she can feel him.
12121.content:
Growing wide-eyed, Ash soon remembered what had happened. He had been traveling with Iris in the Unova region! How did he forget that? But, where was she? Looking around, the perplexed trainer didn't see any sign of his friend. Did she not get sent wherever he did?

"Iris! Hey Iris! Where are you?" Calling out as loudly as he could, Ash frowned unsure of what to do now. There was no sign of the purple haired dragon trainer anywhere. Hopefully she was alright. Turning around and walking in the opposite direction he had been standing in, the diminutive boy tried to recall where he was. This place looked familiar to him but he still couldn't piece it together properly.

'Let's see... I was traveling with Iris and Pikachu in this forest... I think. We had set up camp, and then I went out to check out a noise I heard... then I woke up...?' It didn't sound right, but it also didn't not sound right either. This was really beginning to get on his nerves! But, he soon came to a sight that confirmed his worst fears.

As he walked up a small incline, his campsite came into view. And it was just as big and large as the rest of the forest around him. 'I guess this means I somehow shrunk...' His memories were right after all. Looking around the camp, Ash's eyes soon lit up as he saw Iris eating across from the fire they had made. She was still here! But, gigantic...

Gulping as he saw his dark skinned companion chewing on one of the sandwiches set out, the tiny trainer wondered if he could somehow get her attention. This could be bad...

He had to try and get her to see him, but how?
12121.title: Iris was with him...

1213.content: Which one of them was the companion? Or was it multiple?
1213.title: Mallow, Lana, Lillie, other

info.brief_description: A tale of what happens to Ash when he get's shrunk, and who ends up finding him first...
info.description:
This is a Pokémon story featuring Ash from the anime.

Basic premise being that after interfering with Team Rocket's plans for too long, they end up shrinking him. The aftermath that follows and who the one(s) who find him are, are up to you to decide. This is a free for all story, and anything goes when it comes to the cast of Pokémon. However, this IS and should be focused on a giantess story. So please keep the use of giants away from Ash at all times. They can be mentioned or talk to him but CANNOT use his, or interact with him like the various girl's will. Female Pokémon may be used as well if you so choose.

Preferred fetishes:
Anal Vore
Insertion
Femdom
Entrapment
Sweat Play
Enslavement

ALL other fetishes are allowed too.

Things that are not allowed are as follows:

Male/Male
Multiple shrunken people (Keep it just to Ash being shrunken)

All female characters in the series are allowed. None are off limits!

Everything else is fair game. While it's preferred for crueler scenarios in this story, the more gentler ones are by no means off limits. Feel free to write Ash up with a gentle giantess if you'd like, but also give the opportunity for others to write what they want to. DO NOT end a chapter you don't like simply because it doesn't fit with what you want it to be. If found, they will be deleted immediately and put back to their prior state so others may continue them if they wish too.

All chapters longer then a paragraph will be awarded with points, so please feel free to have fun with this story.
